memories.name: Product Design Collaboration
memories.episode_body: Work closely with Maya on product strategy and with Olivia's team on design execution. Want to improve customer interview skills and quantitative analysis.

memories.name: Nathan Lee - Product Designer
memories.episode_body: Nathan Lee is Product Designer at TechFlow Solutions on Product team. Specializes in user research, product design, and validating features with customers. 3 years product design experience. Bridges product strategy and design execution.

memories.name: Customer Interview Insights
memories.episode_body: Conducted 10 customer interviews January 2026 about checkout experience. Key findings: users want guest checkout option, saved payment methods for faster repeat purchases, clearer shipping cost transparency. These informed Q1-Q2 roadmap priorities.
